titleStmt.title: The speech of his excellency, Henry Lord Viscount Sydney, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland, to both Houses of Parliament assembled at Dublin. October 5. 1692.
titleStmt.author: Romney, Henry Sidney, Earl of, 1641-1704.\

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to their most Excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
